attributes.action: Apply the MOD housing reform as intended on 11th March 2024
attributes.additional_details: The housing reform is vital to keeping up with society and housing serving personnel on a needs based system. Also aligning serving personnel in a recognised long term relationship with those married brings the army up to date with social norms and caters for the modern family unit. If this policy change is delayed it will have a negative effect on the biggest problems the Army is currently facing, recruitment, retention and moral.
attributes.background: Implement the MOD housing reform as intended on the 11th March. This is a retention bonus and in the best interest of the majority of serving personnel.

rejection.details:
